![Bringing you design to life!](https://portal.dmmedia.co.uk/images/logo.png)

We have UK BASED business class servers with a Virtualizor control panel, on our servers located in Coventry in the UK and better yet instant setup.

Each VPS comes with:

  * 7 Day Money Back Guarantee
  * 99.9% Network Uptime Guarantee
  * 24/7 Live Chat and Ticket Support
  * OpenVZ Virtualisation Platform
  * Over 20 Templates Overing CentOS, Fedora,Scientific, Suse, Ubuntu
  * Available in Coventry, UK
  * Work with a Fully Accredited UK VAT Registered Company (**Don't Accept less from a EU trader - IT'S LAW**)
  * All Prices INCLUSIVE of VAT (Clients OUTSIDE of the EU VAT deducted at checkout **SO YOU PAY LESS**)
  * Instant Activation - Upon Payment

Mouse VPS
===============================
  * 2 Cpu Cores
  * 512MB Ram
  * 30GB Diskspace
  * 2000GB Bandwidth
  * 1 IP Address
**£3.60 per month (5.05USD)** - [click here to order](https://portal.dmmedia.co.uk/cart.php?a=add&pid=29)

[Full Features & Operating Systems](http://www.dmmedia.co.uk/vps-servers/) | [Terms of Service](http://www.dmmedia.co.uk/hosting-terms-and-conditions/)

If you have any questions just give us a shout at support@dmmedia.co.uk or give us a call on 03301 13 14 15 (open GMT 9:00 - 17:00)

Our plans start from just £3.60 per month, all our plans come with a fair trial 7 day money back guarantee, All plans are INCLUSIVE of UK VAT applied to all EU Sales (outside EU VAT will be deducted at checkout!)

Frequently Asked Questions:
----------------
Q. What do I need to do to receive the 7-day money back guarantee?

A. You must cancel within the first 7 days, contact billing and your money will be refunded within 24 hours without quibble.

Q: Where Is The Server Located?

A: Our servers are located in the UK
